body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Sunshine Daycare Center support. My name is Jack Richardson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jennifer. Can you please provide me with your contact number and email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five triple one double zero and my email address is jbrown@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jennifer. How can I assist you today regarding the shipping issue you're facing with Sunshine Daycare Center?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit confused about the delivery timeframe. Can you clarify how long it usually takes for the packages to arrive?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Normally, it takes around two to three business days for our shipments to reach their destination depending on the location. Is there anything else you would like to know, Jennifer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Could you also provide an update on the billing process for the extra services I added last month?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly, let me check on that for you, Jennifer. Thank you for your patience. I will get back to you with the details shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jennifer, for your time and patience today. Please feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jack. Have a great day too!
